definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">/&#10;//Import file class  &#10;import java.io.File;  &#10;//Import Scanner class   &#10;import java.util.Scanner;  &#10;public class CreateFolder {  &#10;    //Main() method start  &#10;    public static void main(String args[]) {        &#10;      //Using Scanner class to get the path from the user where he wants to create a folder.  &#10;      System.out.println("Enter the path where you want to create a folder: ");  &#10;      Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);  &#10;      String path = sc.next();  &#10;      //Using Scanner class to get the folder name from the user  &#10;      System.out.println("Enter the name of the desired a directory: ");  &#10;      path = path+sc.next();  &#10;      //Instantiate the File class   &#10;      File f1 = new File(path);  &#10;      //Creating a folder using mkdir() method  &#10;      boolean bool = f1.mkdir();  &#10;      if(bool){  &#10;         System.out.println("Folder is created successfully"); \&#10;      }else{  &#10;         System.out.println("Error Found!");  &#10;      }  &#10;   }  &#10;}  </field></block></next></block></xml>
